description: Plan, architect, direct & deliver various projects
extendedDescription: I oversee all of the development work and contribute primarily to the main engine. The main engine is a React engine that outputs interactive directories for various types of properties (Malls, Universities, Office, etc). It plugs straight into our CMS which I also oversee the development of.

description: Created Data Visualizations for the LA Kings, Calgary Flames and others
extendedDescription: Mentored junior developers and produced all sorts of data visualizations for sports teams such as the LA Kings and organizations like MoMA.

description: Contributed to PubPub; a Platform for collaborative science
extendedDescription: Worked with an incredible team of graduate students at the MIT Media Lab in the creation of a colloborative editing and reviewing platform for scientific research. It was used by Snowden and Bunny, as well as other researchers.

description: Dating startup focused on Muslim Americans
extendedDescription: Cofounded a dating startup that went viral and got a spot at a startup accelerator

Created a multiplayer browser game along with the incredibly talented Jason Davies. This game never passed Alpha. There's a newer supercharged prototype of it in a private repository but it's not ready to be deployed quite yet.

description: Game intended to teach children about recycling
extendedDescription: Mentored a team of programmers and worked with artists in the production of an educational game. This game was featured in the UCSD newspaper and got some attention from nearby schools.

description: Game built for a custom console built with a Raspberry PI, beer bottles and milk crates
extendedDescription: Made this awesome game! However I have no image of it in action unfortunately. This is an image of the flaschen taschen which is a console made out of beer bottles, milk crates & a raspberry PI.

description: I turned a nightmare I had as a child into a game

extendedDescription: Conributed full stack and mentored a junior developer. I wrote a lot of Rails code and paired often with the senior engineers.

description: Developed features for a photoshop like browser application
extendedDescription: Worked on a photoshop like application optimized for creating car dealership advertisements. It was a lot of intensive frontend programming.
